name: ZeeQS 2.1.0
body:
## Changelog

* (feat): include the Postgres driver making it easier to use the database (#163)
* (deps): bump zeebe-hazelcast-connector from 1.0.0 to 1.0.1
* (deps): bump hazelcast from 4.2 to 4.2.2
* (deps): bump spring-boot-dependencies from 2.5.0 to 2.5.4

name: ZeeQS 2.0.0
body:
## :warning: Compatibility 

This version is compatible with

* Zeebe >= `1.0.0`
* Zeebe Hazelcast exporter >= [1.0.0](https://github.com/camunda-community-hub/zeebe-hazelcast-exporter/releases/tag/1.0.0)

## :fire: Notes

This version breaks the compatibility with previous versions of the application. The GraphQL API and the database schema were updated to align with the new Zeebe version.

## Changelog

* feat(hazelcast): import process records (#135)
* feat(hazelcast/graphql): import and expose message variable (#135)
* feat(graphql): find message subscriptions by process (#135)
* refactor(data/graphql): rename the term workflow by process to align with the new Zeebe version (#135)
* build(deps): bump zeebe-bom from 0.26.2 to 1.0.0 (#128) 
* build(deps): bump zeebe-hazelcast-connector from 0.10.0 to 1.0.0 (#128) 
* build(deps): bump hazelcast from 4.1.1 to 4.2
* build(deps): bump spring-boot-dependencies from 2.4.3 to 2.5.0 (#132)

name: ZeeQS 1.0.0
body:
## :warning: Compatibility 

This version is compatible with

* Zeebe <= `0.26.3`
* Zeebe Hazelcast exporter <= [0.10.0](https://github.com/camunda-community-hub/zeebe-hazelcast-exporter/releases/tag/0.10.0)

## Changelog

* (feat): replace the pagination parameter `limit` by `perPage` (#72)
* (feat): import error records and expose a query (#107)
* (fix): avoid database errors when loading large objects (#106) 
* (deps): bump `hazelcast` from `4.1` to `4.1.1` 
* (deps): bump `zeebe-hazelcast-connector` from `0.9.1` to `0.10.0` (#74) 

:tada: Releasing the version `1.0.0` after one year with alpha versions. This version contains the basic feature set and seems to be stable enough to use. Further versions will contain more improvements and add new features :rocket: 
Thanks a lot to the early users and contributors :cake:

name: ZeeQS 1.0.0-alpha5
body:
## Changelog

* change the type of big columns to `LOB` + serialize enums as strings instead of numbers (#67)

name: ZeeQS 1.0.0-alpha4
body:
## Changelog

* the Hazelcast ring-buffer name and more connection retry options can be configured (#59)

:warning: The Hazelcast configuration prefix changed from `io.zeebe.hazelcast` to `zeebe.client.worker.hazelcast`. An existing configuration must be adjusted. For example, the connection to Hazelcast must now be configured as `zeebe.client.worker.hazelcast.connection=zeebe:5701` (instead of `zeebe.hazelcast.connection=zeebe:5701`).

name: ZeeQS 1.0.0-alpha3
body:
## Changelog

* (deps): bump `zeebe-hazelcast-connector` from `0.9.0` to `0.9.1`
* (deps): bump `zeebe-bom` from `0.23.1` to `0.24.2`

name: ZeeQS 1.0.0-alpha2
body:
## Changelog 

* (feat): a timer hat a start and an end time (#22) 
* (feat): a job has a start and an end time (#22) 
* (feat): unify pagination of queries (#25) 
* (fix): don't import records with negative keys (#21)
* (fix): return deployment time as ISO-8601 string (#23)
* (deps): bump `zeebe-hazelcast-connector` to `0.9.0` (using Hazelcast `4.0.1`) (#26)

name: ZeeQS 1.0.0-alpha1
body:
## First Release :balloon: 

* import data from Hazelcast exporter
* store data in an internal database (In-Memory H2) 
* provider a GraphQL API for workflows, instances, jobs, incidents, messages, etc.
